comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: 1.envato.market
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://1.envato.market/c/410396/275988/4415](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F1.envato.market%2Fc%2F410396%2F275988%2F4415) ### Comment > I'm experiencing issues with AdGuard blocking my legitimate affiliate links from https://impact.com for Themeforest and Envato Elements. The affected links are: > > https://1.envato.market/c/410396/275988/4415 > https://1.envato.market/c/410396/298927/4662 > https://1.envato.market/DWG > > Currently, I can only access these links by: > > 1. Restarting Windows > 2. Disabling AdGuard > 3. Opening the affiliate links > > I've tried adding these URLs to the user filtering rules, but they remain blocked. This is significantly impacting my work as I need constant access to these affiliate links. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kntne3d5vjkswk4g04c4sg08ogc44gg3rsf8dajae2.png?nc=1)

issue.title: www.etoday.co.kr

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: ubo list "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" breaks firefox html caching

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

2.0.53.99 - 2025-04-18T17:07:05+00:00 (c80Xt+k3QKfVoKtCS66NTw)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

all pages

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Popups filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


Enabling "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" prevents new cache entries for the html content being generated.

Steps for verification:
\- Disable "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" in ubo.
\- Visit a regular static website, navigate to another page.
\- Open devtools and observe the size transferred in the Network tab.
Navigating back and forth through the history will show transferred: cached for the pages html.
\- Enable "AdGuard – Popup Overlays" in ubo.
\- Reload the page.
\- Navigate back and forth.
The reloaded and newly opened pages will show something along transferred: 12.34kb

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
